articles.title: Have YOU suffered Apple's 14 Pro Max's 'freezing bug'? - Daily Mail
articles.description: Is your iPhone 14 Pro Max freezing? You are not alone. Many users of the new smartphone report the 'freezing bug' that strikes randomly - but DailyMail.com has tips to stop it from happening.
articles.content:
Users report their new iPhone 14 Pro Max is regularly freezing. Experts told DailyMail.com that trying to do a 'hard restart' is one way to fix the problem
